details.claim_text: The trailer for "AUKAAT KE BAHAR" has been released, signaling a significant impact and revealing the true 'status' of those who considered themselves bosses.
details.claim_context: The post announces the release of the "AUKAAT KE BAHAR" trailer, using a Hindi quote that implies 'the game is over, now it's serious,' and that those who saw themselves as bosses will now have their true 'status' revealed, emphasizing the dramatic and impactful nature of the release.

original_verification.content_summary: The post announces the release of the "AUKAAT KE BAHAR" trailer, using a Hindi quote that implies 'the game is over, now it's serious,' and that those who saw themselves as bosses will now have their true 'status' revealed, emphasizing the dramatic and impactful nature of the release.
